channel.title: Google Adsense Members, look here
channel.description:
If you don't already know... When a user downloads and installs Firefox through your referral, google will give you $1 per person/computer. So I was asking anyone on my MSN list that doesn't already have Firefox to install it using my referral on one of my sites... When it hit me, school's have tons of computers. So last friday during my tv production class I installed it on 4 computers and come home to see $4 profit. I've got 3 other classes located in computer labs, not to mention the library computers.
I haven't tryed this with any of the other google referrals yet, such as Google Pack and Picasa, but I plan to try it monday. Think of the possibilities ;)
I thought i'd share this with anyone who is a google adsense member. :)
